summary: AN ORDINANCE approving payment of certain audited claims; payment of the sum of Six Million, Eight Hundred Seventy Four Thousand Three Hundred Two Dollars and Sixty Seven Cents ($6,874, 302.67) dollars on Salary Fund warrants numbered 427414 - 435224 for claims against the City which were audited by the Auditing Committee and reported by said committee to the City Council on the 31st day of May 1982, consistent with appropriations heretofore made for such purpose from the appropriate Funds, is hereby approved.
